apple_vendor_description: This representation of a loving couple on Apple devices features two men with light skin tones, their forms subtly shaded with Appleâ€™s characteristic glossy 3D effect. A soft, glowing heart hovers between them, its smooth gradient radiating warmth and affection, a hallmark of Apple's emotional design. The figures on Apple devices appear close and connected, symbolizing romantic love, partnership, and deep affection between two men.
